review: I had visited the hospital and it for my arthritis health problem, I had joint pain. Doctor spoke nicely and explained all details and reports. Due to lock down I am unable to continue treatment. And the Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. Blood test and CT scan was also done. I am feeling better now. Waiting time was not there in hospital. I am satisfied with the treatment given.  I can recommend this doctor to my family or friends. Doctor gave nice counselling, she told to do lifestyle changes. Hospitality was good.

We had one of the best reassuring experiences with Dr. Hema. She was patient enough to thoroughly examine the results and conduct  physical examinations and explained to us what these parameters mean. Most importantly, she diagnosed the actual condition and referred us to a specialist in another stream for further treatment.

I came from tambaram .waiting one hour... She did not let me come inside one minute to clear my doubt of vitamin d deficiency. She asked last visit to get scan nuclear bone scan... Cost is 8500 very costly so I cannot afford it... To discuss tat my financial status low so cannot take scan immediately have to save money will take few months... So to discuss tat I came an I was very sick when I came but she refused to see me said to get scan reports only than can see her... Is tis ur Miot hospital logo.** ** ***** ***** * *** ****** ******** I will never recommend anyone tis hospital.
I have Bad experience.*** ***** ****** ** ********* very rudand rough and tough.I can't refer this dr.in my experience.

We had consulted the doctor and it was for my relative. He was suffering from joint pain . Doctor was very good. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor and had suggested to do the Blood test was done. I am satisfied with the treatment given. Definitely I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. Registration fee was little high but there was no waiting time when I went to the consultation. And my relative is fine now.
